sentences.en: A heavy car with a low center of gravity will hug the road.
sentences.cn: 重心低的载重汽车会在路面上平稳行驶.

sentences.en: An apple falls down because of gravity.
sentences.cn: 由于重力的关系,苹果往下掉.

sentences.en: Anything that is dropped falls towards the centre of the earth because of the pull of gravity.
sentences.cn: 物体脱手即向地心方向跌落是由于重力吸引的缘故.

sentences.en: Anything with strong gravity attracts other things to it.
sentences.cn: 任何有较强重力的物体都会对其他物体产生引力。

sentences.en: Arrows would continue to fly forward forever in a straight line were it not for gravity, which brings them down to earth.
sentences.cn: 要不是重力使箭落向地面，它们将永远以直线往前飞行。

sentences.en: Europe's economic centre of gravity shifted northwards.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的经济重心向北移了.

sentences.en: Freedom, gravity, ego, and electron are constructs.
sentences.cn: 自由, 万有引力, 自我中心以及电子都是概念.

sentences.en: From the expressions on their faces, I realized the gravity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 从他们的脸部表情我晓悟到事情的严重性.

sentences.en: He doesn't think you realize the gravity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他认为你没意识到局势的严重性.

sentences.en: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

sentences.en: Increasing gravity is known to speed up the multiplication of cells.
sentences.cn: 我们知道不断增加的引力会加速细胞的分裂。

sentences.en: Newton proposed that heavenly and terrestrial motion could be unified with the idea of gravity.
sentences.cn: 牛顿提出天体和地球的运动可以用万有引力来解释。

sentences.en: Not all acts of vengeance are of equal gravity.
sentences.cn: 并非所有的报复行为都同等恶劣。

sentences.en: The stone rolled down the mountain by gravity.
sentences.cn: 这块石头由于重力作用而滚下山.

sentences.en: This was a serious breach of trust quite apart from the gravity of any offence.
sentences.cn: 这不光是情节重大的犯罪行为，还是一种严重的背信行为。

words.tran_cn: 不可磨灭的，铭记在心的；雕刻的
[力] 重力的，[力] 引力的
受重力作用的；万有引力的
严重地；严肃地；严峻地；沉重地
比重计；[地物] 重力计
重力；万有引力；地心吸力
[相对][高能] 引力子；万有吸引力

phrases.tran_cn: 重力流；重力怜；重力流动
重力式挡土墙，重力式坝
n. 乳脂上浮；重力分离

trans.tran_en: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet
